info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:34PM MDT until August 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OTERO...SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA...SOUTHEASTERN CROWLEY AND NORTHWESTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 333 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blue Lake to 7 miles west of Las Animas, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter-size hail east of Cheraw. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Las Animas, Swink, Cheraw, Blue Lake, John Martin Reservoir and Fort Lyon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
